column2: Start the story with “Once upon a time there was a…”
Let your child make up the next sentence
Then you make up a sentence
Take turns until you have a wonderful new story
Make sure to end the story on a positive note.
Ask your child what was their favourite part of the story!",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,7a01f775-c7a1-41b1-8418-45e3718b28b4,,execute_actions,;
